message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's worth my while.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that price. How about we try $10,000?
